00010         class SoftwareArtifact extends ActiveRecord
00011         {
00016                 public function filesize_readable()
00017                 {
00018                         return Filesystem::filesize_readable($this->local_file());
00019                 }
00020                 
00025                 public function filesize()
00026                 {
00027                         return Filesystem::filesize($this->local_file());
00028                 }
00029                 
00034                 public function filename()
00035                 {
00036                         if (!$this->file_exists())
00037                         {
00038                                 return span($this->file, array('class' => 'missing-file',
00039                                         'title' => l('Missing file')));
00040                         }
00041                         return $this->file;
00042                 }
00043                 
00048                 public function file_exists()
00049                 {
00050                         return Filesystem::file_exists($this->local_file());
00051                 }
00052 
00058                 public function md5_sum($raw = FALSE)
00059                 {
00060                         return Filesystem::md5_sum($this->local_file(), $raw);
00061                 }
00062                 
00067                 public function icon()
00068                 {
00069                         return sprintf('%sassets/images/download_%s_128.png',
00070                                 APPLICATION_ROOT,
00071                                 ends_with($this->file, '.zip') ? 'zip' : 'dmg');
00072                 }
00073                 
00078                 public function type()
00079                 {
00080                         return substr($this->file, strrpos($this->file, '.') + 1);
00081                 }
00082                 
00083                 public function relative_url()
00084                 {
00085                         return sprintf('/software/download/%s/%s',
00086                                 $this->id,
00087                                 $this->file);
00088                 }
00089                 
00094                 public function local_file()
00095                 {
00096                         return sprintf(dirname(__FILE__) . "/../assets/artifacts/%s",
00097                                 $this->file);
00098                 }
00099                 
00104                 public static function total_downloads()
00105                 {
00106                         global $db;
00107                         $db->prepare('SELECT SUM(`downloads`) FROM `software_artifacts` WHERE 1');
00108                         $db->exec();
00109                         return $db->result(0);
00110                 }
00111         }
